comments:
NPE was thrown after repeating deleting chart name for a few times[00]
Build number:
2.2.0.v20070613-1211
Steps to reproduce:
1.New a chart
2.Go to properties sheet 
3.Delete chart name then click on other white space
4.Error pops up then click ok
5.Repeat step 3 and 4 about 10 times
Expected result:
No NPE will be thrown
Actual result:
NPE was thrown
